notes: This dataset is from an assessment of Water and Sanitation (WASH) in the Diffa Region of Niger, conducted by REACH in June 2016 on behalf of the Niger WASH Cluster, with the support of the Global WASH Cluster. Data was collected from a statistically representative sample of water points in displacement sites in the Diffa Region and  provides information about their functionality, condition and the presence of management committees. Info is available about latrines, and hygiene practices (non-representative sample)
